law.text: No engine, fire truck, or other apparatus of the Fire Department shall leave the City except with the consent of the City Manager or Chief of the Fire Department, or in the absence of the Chief, the Assistant or Division Chief, upon urgent call in cases of fire in neighboring towns or cities.
